name: Instagram Complete Dark Theme v1.0 [24/01/2017]
description:
Based upon damikiller37 theme, This is the COMPLETE dark theme for Instagram including fixed for Search Bar, Suggested box, Edit profile section and even more.

Hit me up on Twitter @AOFathy to ask for updates!
additional_info:
1.0
Initial release based upon damikiller37 theme v1.07
Fixed search bar
Fixed following button
Fixed suggested box
Fixed edit profile sections

Credits
Thanks to damikiller37 for the main theme
